title: Mudhan Mudhalaga Song Lyrics Engal Anna
stanzas:
sil endru ennai
seendi sendridum
megathai naan paarthen

mounangalaal ennai
nee thaakkinaai
mogangalaal ennai
kaithaakinaai
idhu niyayam thaanaa
sollu kannae.

sil endru ennai
seendi sendridum
megathai naan paarthen

Margazhiyin rathiriyil
manasukkul malligai poo
moodivaitha udhadugalil
muthangalin munu munupu

thookkathai thookkathai
thookkile podanum
kanavilum vandhum ne
imisaigal seigiraai

un jannalgalai moodaathe
en thendraluku verkiradhu
en kaipudikka varuvaayaa
kairegai ennai kaetkiradhe

Thorkavillai thoagai mayil
ithanai naal yaengiyadhe
megathidam adam pidithu
mazhai thuli vaangiyadhe

yaekkangal theerndhathaa
ennuyir kadhali
unnidam saaindhathe
intha yaeni thaanadi

un sattaikulle idam thaedi
en moochukaatru alaigirathe
un seelai vaasam vandha pinne
en kaalaigalum vidigirathe

sil endru ennai
seendi sendridum
megathai naan paarthen

mounangalaal ennai
nee thaakkinaai
mogangalaal ennai
kaithaakinaai
idhu niyayam thaanaa
sollu kannae.

sil endru ennai
seendi sendridum
megathai naan paarthen

seo.title: Mudhan Mudhalaga Song Lyrics Engal Anna
seo.description: Get the complete Mudhan Mudhalaga Song Lyrics Engal Anna from Engal Anna. composed by Deva and sung by Hariharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Engal Anna, Deva, Hariharan, Sadhana Sargam, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
